mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel(hotelNum, partnerNum, hotelName, hotelIntro, hotelNumber, hotelZip, hotelAddr1, hotelAddr2) VALUES (hotel_seq, #{partnerNum}, #{hotelName}, #{hotelIntro}, #{hotelNumber}, #{hotelZip}, #{hotelAddr1}, #{hotelAddr2})
mapper.select: SELECT h.hotelNum, p.partnerNum, hotelName, hotelIntro, hotelNumber, hotelZip, hotelAddr1, hotelAddr2 FROM hotel h JOIN partner p ON p.partnerNum = h.partnerNum WHERE p.partnerId = #{partnerId}

SELECT hotelNum, hotelName, hotelIntro, hotelNumber, hotelZip, hotelAddr1, hotelAddr2, partnerNum, saveFilename FROM hotel h JOIN hotelImage hI ON h.hotelNum = hI.hotelNum WHERE hotelNum = #{hotelNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotelImage(imageFileNum, hotelNum, saveFilename) VALUES (hotelImage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{hotelNum}, #{saveFilename})
